name: Strandy's Adventure
description:
Play as Strandy, a slime capable of casting strands of slimey goo to use as a rope, will you be able to traverse through all levels using your abilities?

Controls:

- When walking

A/D to move, SPACE to jump, LMB or J to throw the rope.

- When grappling

A/D to swing to the sides, W shortens the rope, S to make it longer instead, use SPACE, LMB or J to release the rope.

Hint: You can lift yourself off the ground using the rope by throwing it below you and holding S to rappel yourself above the ground.
